show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host, Dr Eugene Zampieron, ND, MH, www.drznaturally.com ,  interviews Dr. Gaetano Morello. Dr. Morello is a board certified Naturopathic Physicians practicing at the Complement Health Centre in West Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.
He received his Bachelor of Science degree from the University of British Columbia and received his Doctor of Naturopathic Medicine from the Bastyr University of Natural Health Sciences in Seattle, Washington in 1991.
For the last 20 years Dr Morello has been training and educating, physicians, pharmacists, medical students and health food store personnel on the scientific use of natural medicines.
  He sits on the Quality Assurance Committee for the College of Naturopathic Physicians of British Columbia and is often featured as an expert guest on television, radio shows and print media.
He is author of several best selling books including Whole Body Cleansing, Cleanse Ultimate Inside Out Approach as well as a contributing author to a “Textbook of Natural Medicine” a definitive text on natural medicine in the world.
